scenario_text.value: What a bunch of garbage. Makes me sick.

That bastard showed me the worst thing he
could.
Still, he taught me something good.

You know the answer, don’t you? You and me,
we’re bonded by fate after all, ain’t we?

The bastards who stole Miu... Those jerks who
couldn’t save her!

It’s all their fault! And it’s my job to show
them who’s to blame!

Don’t you worry, Miu. I’ll show them. They’ll
pay for making you suffer!

I’ll kill them...all of them...with my own
two hands!
